channel.title: Need help how do i change the Welcome message at begining of login?
channel.description: i need really bad help changing that welcome message at the beginning of login . can anyone help me please and give exact steps. thanks.!

item.title: Need help how do i change the Welcome message at begining of login?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Well, what you do, if its delta, is just search for the first couple words of what it says when u log in, into client.java

ex/ I search for welcome to de

I get sM(“Welcome To Definitive X!”);
Change tht… and save and compile

Read full topic
item.source: Need help how do i change the Welcome message at begining of login?

item.title: Need help how do i change the Welcome message at begining of login?

Search for: sM("(The message on your server)");

item.title: Need help how do i change the Welcome message at begining of login?
item.dc:creator: @godswords godswords
item.description:
@godswords wrote:

Delta = client.java
Pi- config.java
DSPK- config.java/announcements.java
